item.title: Testing Dynamics 365 Finance Database Movement API with Postman
item.author: luan52@outlook.com (Max Nguyen)
item.description: Test Dynamics 365 Finance Database Movement APIs using Postman with complete authentication setup and examples. Learn to list backups, refresh databases, and export data programmatically.
